headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid NDSN and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Nordson has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 21.9% to $232.68 per share while the index has gained 21%.
